thread.title: Celebrities: Glee Actor Dean Geyer’s Sex Tape Leaked
thread.title_full: Celebrities: Glee Actor Dean Geyer’s Sex Tape Leaked

author: Dave
title: Celebrities: Glee Actor Dean Geyer’s Sex Tape Leaked
text:
Photo Credits: Ana Rivas 
South African Australian actor and singer-songwriter Dean Geyer has a sex tape making the rounds in the Internet. 
The thirty-one-year-old is best-known for his stint in Glee as Brody Weston, the guy who served as Rachel Berry’s (Lea Michele) love interest for when she separated with Finn and went to New York to attend NYADA. Dean has amazing vocals and he’s gorgeous too. Yes, yes, I watched the whole show but that’s all I’m going to share in case you haven’t watched it yet. 
Anyway, the leaked video is short; it runs for a minute and fourteen seconds only and he was shown in bed with his fiancée, Jillian Murray (they reportedly got engaged December last year). Check it out below.
